Package src.feedback.suggestions

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
src.feedback.enquiry.Feedback
src.feedback.suggestions.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Feedback
The Suggestion class represents a feedback object specifically for suggestions made by the camp committee. It extends the Feedback class and includes additional properties such as the suggested change, category, and status of the suggestion.

This class is part of the feedback and suggestion module in the application.

Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0
Author:
Shun Ping

  • Constructor Details

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(String description, CampCommittee sender, CampInfo camp, String change, int category, SuggestionStatus status)
      Constructs a new Suggestion object with the specified description, sender, camp, change, category, and status. The suggestion is added to the associated camp's list of suggestions, and points are awarded to the sender based on the status.
      Parameters:
      description - The textual description of the suggestion.
      sender - The camp committee member who made the suggestion.
      camp - The camp associated with the suggestion.
      change - The suggested change.
      category - The category of the suggestion.
      status - The status of the suggestion.

      Gets the proposed change for the suggestion.
      Returns:
      The proposed change for the suggestion.

    • getStatus

      public SuggestionStatus getStatus()
      Gets the status of the suggestion.
      Returns:
      The status of the suggestion.

    • reject

      public void reject()
      Rejects the suggestion, setting its status to SuggestionStatus.REJECTED}.

    • accept

      public void accept()
      Accepts the suggestion, setting its status to SuggestionStatus.ACCEPTED}. Adds points to the sender based on the status.
